sn46.39:1.1: “Santi, bhikkhave, maharukkha anubija mahakaya rukkhanam ajjharuha, yehi rukkha ajjharulha obhaggavibhagga vipatita senti.
sn46.39:1.2: Katame ca te, bhikkhave, maharukkha anubija mahakaya rukkhanam ajjharuha, yehi rukkha ajjharulha obhaggavibhagga vipatita senti?
sn46.39:1.3: Assattho, nigrodho, pilakkho, udumbaro, kacchako, kapitthano—
sn46.39:1.4: ime kho te, bhikkhave, maharukkha anubija mahakaya rukkhanam ajjharuha, yehi rukkha ajjharulha obhaggavibhagga vipatita senti.
sn46.39:1.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco kulaputto yadisake kame ohaya agarasma anagariyam pabbajito hoti, so tadisakehi kamehi tato va papitthatarehi obhaggavibhaggo vipatito seti.
sn46.39:2.1: Pancime, bhikkhave, avarana nivarana cetaso ajjharuha pannaya dubbalikarana.
sn46.39:2.3: Kamacchando, bhikkhave, avarano nivarano cetaso ajjharuho pannaya dubbalikarano.
sn46.39:2.4: Byapado, bhikkhave, avarano nivarano cetaso ajjharuho pannaya dubbalikarano.
sn46.39:2.5: Thinamiddham, bhikkhave, avaranam nivaranam cetaso ajjharuham pannaya dubbalikaranam.
sn46.39:2.6: Uddhaccakukkuccam, bhikkhave, avaranam nivaranam cetaso ajjharuham pannaya dubbalikaranam.
sn46.39:2.7: Vicikiccha, bhikkhave, avarana nivarana cetaso ajjharuha pannaya dubbalikarana.
sn46.39:2.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca avarana nivarana cetaso ajjharuha pannaya dubbalikarana.
sn46.39:3.1: Sattime, bhikkhave, bojjhanga anavarana anivarana cetaso anajjharuha bhavita bahulikata vijjavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaya samvattanti.
sn46.39:3.3: Satisambojjhango, bhikkhave, anavarano anivarano cetaso anajjharuho bhavito bahulikato vijjavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaya samvattati …pe… upekkhasambojjhango, bhikkhave, anavarano anivarano cetaso anajjharuho bhavito bahulikato vijjavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaya samvattati.
sn46.39:3.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhanga anavarana anivarana cetaso anajjharuha bhavita bahulikata vijjavimuttiphalasacchikiriyaya samvattanti”ti.
